Title: Relates to pricing changes for online grocery delivery and online pick-up services
Summary: Requires the clear and conspicuous disclosure of pricing changes for online grocery delivery and online pick-up services; imposes a fine of not more than one hundred dollars for the first offense and not more than two hundred fifty dollars for a second and each subsequent offense for violations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the disclosure of pricing changes for online grocery delivery and online pick-up services
